mapper.select: select b.id, b.username, b.PASSWORD, b.real_name, b.ref_name, b.user_type, b.user_state, b.email, b.phone, b.mobile, b.reg_time, b.last_login, b.login_ip, b.reg_ip, b.is_verified, b.is_account, b.introducer, b.recommend, b.sex, b.country, b.province, b.city, b.address, b.follow_level, b.id_obverse, b.id_Front, b.avatar_url, b.salt, b.create_date, b.modify_date FROM fu_user a INNER JOIN fu_user b ON a.introducer = b.id where a.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
